game_description: Welcome to Super Gun Arena, a 4 player crossplatform deathmatch, where you can experience the battlefield of the future, the past and the wild west. Show your skills with different weapon types as a sniper, a marine or a cowboy. Have unique moments with your friends or random strangers from all around the world from 2 to up to 4 player.
review_1: There are literally no players on this game. Therefore, I have the choice of joining a room.......which there are none cause nobody is playing it.....OR I can Host my own game and wait on other players...............which never join cause NOBODY IS PLAYING IT!!! Hell, put in some BOTS or something and let us play that until someone comes along. ANYTHING!! Otherwise, it may just be $5, but it's $5 for NOTHING!!!
review_2: Game play is fun but aim needs work and more levels also need bots when no one is online please fun game to have
